title: Snap is Moving
description: This weekend we are moving our podcast feed. You will still be able to listen to Snap Judgment on the radio and wherever you get your podcasts, but we want to make sure you don’t miss a beat. Make sure Snap stays in your feed by subscribing. Next week, check to see you have the new epic Snap episode, "Chasing Thunder." If you don't see it in your feed, please refresh or resubscribe!
itunes:subtitle: This weekend we are moving our podcast feed.
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and PRX
